Song.title: Immovable Our Hope Remains
Song.copyright: © 2012 Sovereign Grace Praise Original words by August Toplady Music & alternate words by Bob Kauflin & Brittany Kauflin

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G D Em G | Em C D G (repeat)]
V. 1: Im[G]mova[D]ble our [Em]hope re[G]mains{,} though [Em]shifting sands be[D]fore us [G]lie The [G]One who [D]washed a[Em]way our [G]stains{,} shall [Em]bear us safely [D]to the [G]skies The [D]floods may rise, the [Am]winds may [Em]beat{,} torrential rains des[C]cend [G] Yet [D]God His own will [Am]not for[Em]get. He’ll [C]love and keep us till the [Bm]end You’ll [C]love and [Em]keep us [D]till the [(intro)]end
V. 2: This [G]is e[D]ternal [Em]life:{,} to [G]know the [Em]living God{,} and [D]Christ, the [G]Son The [G]Savior [D]will not [Em]let us [G]go{,} un[Em]til His saving [D]work is [G]done Our [D]debt was great, as [Am]was our [Em]need,{,} but now the price is [C]paid [G] Who [D]can behold Im[Am]manuel [Em]bleed{,} and [C]doubt His willingness to [Bm]save? We [C]trust Your [Em]willing[D]ness to [(intro)]save
V. 3: The [G]Lord ac[D]quits, who [Em]can con[G]demn?{,} Though [Em]Satan’s accu[D]sations [G]fly His [G]pow’r can [D]never [Em]reach our [G]names{,} to [Em]blot them from the [D]Book of [G]Life The [D]Son has surely [Am]made us [Em]free.{,} His Word forever [C]stands [G] And [D]all our joy is [Am]knowing [Em]we{,} are [C]graven on His wounded [Bm]hands We’re [C]graven [Em]on Your [D]wounded [3/4 G]hands
Inst: [3/4 G | 5/4 D/G Em C | 3/4 G | G | 5/4 D/G Em D | 6/4 C D ]
{key:A} V. 4: Built [A]into [E]Christ, se[F#m]cure we [A]stand,{,} for [F#m]with His Spirit [E]we’ve been [A]sealed By [A]grace we’ll [E]see the [F#m]promised [A]land, where [F#m]every sorrow [E]shall be [D]healed To [E]God who gave His [Bm]only [F#m]Son, to Jesus Christ, our [D]Lord [A] To [E]God the Spirit, [Bm]Three in [F#m]one, be [D]songs of praise forever[C#m]more We’ll [D]sing Your [Bm]praise for[E]ever[3/4 A]more
End: [3/4 A |5/4 E/A F#m D |3/4 A | A |5/4 E/A F#m D | A]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro v 1 immovable our hope remains though shifting sands before us lie the one who washed away our stains shall bear us safely to the skies the floods may rise the winds may beat torrential rains descend yet god his own will not forget hell love and keep us till the end youll love and keep us till the end v 2 this is eternal life to know the living god and christ the son the savior will not let us go until his saving work is done our debt was great as was our need but now the price is paid who can behold immanuel bleed and doubt his willingness to save we trust your willingness to save v 3 the lord acquits who can condemn though satans accusations fly his powr can never reach our names to blot them from the book of life the son has surely made us free his word forever stands and all our joy is knowing we are graven on his wounded hands were graven on your wounded hands inst v 4 built into christ secure we stand for with his spirit weve been sealed by grace well see the promised land where every sorrow shall be healed to god who gave his only son to jesus christ our lord to god the spirit three in one be songs of praise forevermore well sing your praise forevermore end
